Types of application software


-   Word processor

    -   Microsoft word

    -   Google docs

    -   Apple works

-   Spread sheet

    -   Microsoft excel

    -   Google sheets

-   Graphics

    -   Adobe photoshop

    -   CorelDRAW

    -   Picasa

    -   Gimp

    -   Davinci Resolve

-   Internet Browser

    -   Firefox

    -   Chrome

    -   IE

    -   Edge

    -   Brave

-   Operating system

    -   Android

    -   iOS

    -   Linux

    -   Windows

    -   ChromeOS

-   Anti-virus

    -   AVG

    -   McAfee

    -   Norton

-   Email

    -   Outlook

    -   Gmail

    -   Hotmail

    -   Proton mail

-   Database software

    -   MySQL

    -   PostgreSQL

    -   SQL server

    -   MongoDB

-   Application software

    -   Microsoft office 365

    -   Adobe creative cloud
